definition: The word "allein" refers to the state of being without any company or companionship. It is commonly used to describe a person who is alone or solitary, emphasizing their independence or self-reliance. Additionally, it can be used to indicate a situation or condition where someone is left to their own devices or without assistance.

examples.english: He goes to the cinema alone.

examples.german: Allein durch harte Arbeit kann man Erfolg haben.
examples.english: Only through hard work can one succeed.

examples.german: Er ist allein verantwortlich für das Projekt.
examples.english: He is solely responsible for the project.
